name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald W. GREEN, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald W. GREEN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence is vacated and the record is remanded to the trial court for consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Riggins, 474 Pa. 115, 377 A.2d 140 (1977).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. Wherry, Public Defender, Mercer, for appellant.
Samuel J. Orr, IV, Dist. Atty., David B. Douds, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mercer, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
390 A.2d 1263
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald W. GREEN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1978.
Decided Sept. 22, 1978.
Michael J. Wherry, Public Defender, Mercer, for appellant.
Samuel J. Orr, IV, Dist. Atty., David B. Douds, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mercer, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
